Title: Periodic.Net
Description: Periodic.Net is a Periodic Table layout for Windows based on WPF and the .Net Framework 3.5 SP1.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Periodic.Net is a Periodic Table layout for Windows based on WPF and the .Net Framework 3.5 SP1.

Includes support for Groups, Periods, Colorization, Numbering and Tooltips and also supports Lanthanides and Actinides.
